• Feather: Auto-complete does not determine scope correctly when inspector is open
• Feather: Feather displays asset info when inspecting an enum member when they are called the same
• Feather: GM1028 incorrectly raised in some circumstances
• Feather: Inner and outer scope hinting breaks when names are reused
• Feather: Message squiggles move when you click around a document
• Feather: Parameters of type Real accepts String without warning in Strict Mode
• Feather: Tooltips confuse Enum Members and Asset names in some circumstances
• Feather: Using self inside a with statement coming from a constructor fails to correctly identify self
• Feather: Variable defined after same "var" is treated as out of scope
• Inspector: Room Instance Inspector does not update in real-time
• Inspector: The inspector window for a room shows an empty expandable "layers" section
• Sprite Editor: Duplicating a Spine/SWF sprite causes the preview to become corrupted
• Syntax Checker: Mishandles new Aug22 optional arguments for skeleton_animation_set() and skeleton_animation_set_ext()
• Texture groups: The tileset preview within the texture groups menu is distorted
Beta IDE 209
Default Project Layout
<ul>
• The default project layout now includes the Inspector and no longer includes Recent Windows
• Inspector (by default) will sit on the left hand side of the workspace but it is freely movable and dockable
• Though the Inspector has been around for a long time now, we are bringing it to the front
• Your current layout in your project is unaffected by this change
• The Layout -> Reset Layout drop down menu option will reset to this new layout scheme. So use Save Layout if you want to keep your current setup
• Recent Windows can still be opened from the Windows drop down menu
Room Inspector and Room Editor
<ul>
• The Room Inspector is how you will now access many of the settings for rooms
• Before all the settings and layers were cramped into a single panel
• Layers are now their own dockable panel that sits separate from the settings
• Layer Settings, Physics, Viewports and Cameras, Room Size and Creation Code settings are now all part of the inspector exclusively
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Audio Groups: [Mac IDE] The option "move to" is very close to the arrow/ off centre
• Bookmarks: If a line of code/ action block within a script is bookmarked, it will reopen its own workspace tab if accessed again
• Code Editor: Hovering over "Add new event" and then "Single Pane" will close the context menu
• Code Editor: Pre-2022.8 project layouts containing open code editors expand all folded code and lose the ability to code fold until closed and reopened manually
• Debugger: [Mac IDE] Fullscreen IDEs opening windowed debuggers restored from a layout file result in a fullscreen debugger window with black bars to fill the gaps
• Device Manager: [Mac IDE] "Detect Browsers" detects Opera GX as "Opera", blocking it from opening for HTML5 builds
• Feather: Errors in timeline scripts show a red cross image in the Feather Messages Resource column
• Feather: Cannot open timeline resources from the Feather Messages window
• Image Editor: Sat/Val values are automatically rounded down when modifying the other value
• Image Editor: [Mac IDE] Holding "CTRL" whilst using the Paint Selection Tool does not add to the selection
• Inspector [Room Instance] : Inspector changes focus to the wrong element when clicking on "Open Editor" on an instance in a room
• Inspector [Room Instance] : Sequence preview in Canvas does not update when changed via the Inspector
• Inspector: [Mac IDE] A room's Instance Layer's "Instances" list overlaps the entries
• Marketplace Integration: [Mac IDE] Asset description is clipped at the end
• Project Saving: [Windows IDE] No dialog shown to users when unable to rename assets because filepath is too long
• Room Editor [Tile Layer]: Tileset Editor does not open when editing Libraries from the Room Editor
• Room Editor: Creation Code window initially opens to incorrect size
• Search and Replace: Double-clicking on a search result will not scroll to the correct part of the code editor
• Sequence Editor : Animation Curve rendered incomplete
• Start Up: Fatal exception on exiting the IDE during a splash screen
• Start Up: Some users unable to download runtimes due to error "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely..."
Changes Since 2022.9.0.49
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Redefine Keys: More fixes for "String not found: RedefineKeys_...Tool" shown for multiple commands in the Preferences window
• Redefine Keys: Sequence Editor and Font Editor are no longer missing from the list of commands
• Redefine Keys: Fixed an issue where pressing Ctrl+D in the Font Editor would not actually perform the "Delete selected range" command (only affected Windows IDE)
• Room Editor: Added a check when opening a room to ensure there is always an Inspector open and that it contains the Room Layers panel
Opera Account Settings Migration
<ul>

• In previous releases, if you used one email address for your GameMaker account and a different email for your Opera Account and you have already converted your GameMaker account to be an Opera account on our website, then this would cause your Preferences and Recent Projects, etc., to be “lost”, because GameMaker is now looking in a new folder for them

• This version will rename the original folder for you and avoid you having to “migrate” your settings manually; however, it will only do this if you have not converted already - if you have already converted your account and so this issue applies to you, please see our FAQ for how to quickly and easily recover your settings
Changes To The Default Project Layout
<ul>

• The default project layout now includes the Inspector as a new left-hand dock (but of course it is freely movable and dockable) and no longer includes Recent Windows as a panel inside the right-hand dock
• Though the Inspector has been around for a long time already, we are now bringing it to the front and making it more relevant inside other editors

• Please note that any existing layouts in your projects are of course unaffected by this change, and so if you want to see the changes you can use Layout -> Reset Layout menubar option. (If you have a highly customised layout you use in your projects you may also want to use Save Layout and ensure you backup your current layout.)
• Recent Windows can still be opened from the Windows menubar entry and added to your project layout again if you wish
Changes To How GameMaker Loads/Saves Game Options
<ul>

• Up until now, GameMaker always treated the licence of the last person to open a project as the definitive list of game options that project requires - so if one team member has a lot of targets on their licence all of them would be configured and if the project was then shared with a new team member who only had Test, a lot of those options would be removed again
• Now, your options will “merge” - so if you have team members who have different licence types, the Game Options values will remain in the project and cover everyone’s licences
New Room Inspector And Changes To The Room Editor Layout
<ul>
• The new Room Inspector is how you will now access many of the settings for rooms

• Before, all of a room’s settings and its layers were cramped into a single panel; now, all of the settings are handled as part of the Inspector and the Layers panel is a dockable panel which can be detached and placed where you want

• The Inspector UI is also more dynamic/responsive and only shows certain functionality if it’s relevant (e.g., Inheritance settings are only shown in the Inspector if you are in a child room, rather than always being shown in the old Room Editor layout)
”Opera GX” Target Rebranded As “GX.games”
<ul>
• The target has always been part of a whole ecosystem of releasing your games on the GX.games site and sharing them with others (for free or as paid content), so this new name clarifies that
• If you have not had a look at GX.games and what it offers, please do check it out and play a few games, see if it’s a route you would like to take also
• You already have access to publish games on it (for free) as part of your Opera Account and you can also see our tutorial about what publishing on GX.games involves if you want more info
• Also added a new "os_gxgames" constant (which duplicates the existing "os_operagx", so you do not need to change existing code) in order to be consistent in-game with this branding change
New Options For Texture Group Management
<ul>

• You will now find the texture groups editor has new controls for whether you want to split textures off into their own data files on disk during your builds, as this can be required by bigger games on some platforms which have memory caps on how much data you can have loaded at any moment (e.g., GX.games only allows 2GB)
• You can then use the matching 2022.9 runtimes to load/unload these groups in-game as you require
New Visual Node “Add Motion”
<ul>

• This new function takes a direction and speed and modifies the in-built hspeed and vspeed values accordingly - so you have the one node to manage, but can change several values at once behind-the-scenes (the node performs the following code: hspeed += speed * dcos(direction); vspeed += speed * -dsin(direction);)
• The new node will be part of an upcoming tutorial, so please keep an eye on our tutorials website for more information
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Opera Account users who have never logged-in on the website would see an unhelpful "UID not present" error message in previous releases - this is now the correct "Please complete your profile" message
• Opera Account login now has a proper error message when a timeout has happened, letting you know you simply need to try again

• Opera Account users would receive an unhelpful message in older GM versions when accidentally attempting to login by typing in their old username and password details - this message has now been improved to say your old details no longer work, now you have converted your account, and to simply use the Opera sign-in button instead

• The micro web server is now always stopped when the main IDE is closed, which stops a number of issues (such as “GameMaker is already running” when trying to install an update), but please be aware of this if you’re testing your games after closing GM itself
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• AnimCurve Editor: GM no longer goes unstable after deleting all curve content then closing and reopening the editor
• Asset Browser: ALT+I to create a new included file resource works again, after being broken in 2022.8

• Asset Browser: Duplicating a sound now correctly renames its new source audio file also, stops an error when later running the project [note that if you have an audio asset already in this state you might need to rename its source file manually one time]
• Asset Browser: GM no longer crashes when attempting "Add Existing" for an asset which has a cyclic dependency in its original project
• Bookmarks: Bookmarks on a line of code now remember if they should reopen as a floating editor in the workspace, rather than always opening as a new code editor workspace tab on their own
• Building Projects: [Mac IDE] [HTML5] Fixed being unable to build projects that contain a Spine sprite
• Building Projects: [macOS] Fixed being unable to build a project from the Windows IDE if it is larger than 2GB
• Building Projects: [Xbox GDK YYC] Long path names can still require subst in the Visual Studio/GDK tools, so subst has been re-enabled for this target
• Building Projects: [Xbox GDK] Explorer is now opened to the correct location when a build succeeds, rather than an unexpected subfolder
• Building Projects: Macro definitions which contain pre-increment operations no longer return a compile error
• Building Projects: Fixed that some 2022.8 projects failed to build/clean due to "Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key')" asset compiler error in GMRoom
• Building Projects: Fixed that Supura… no longer builds in recent versions due to SWF files which worked in older GM versions now being marked as incompatible
• Code Editor (Visual): Undo/Redo commands now work correctly again in Execute Code nodes
• Code Editor: [Mac IDE] Region shortcut values now match the values shown in the right-click menu
• Code Editor: Hovering over "Add new event" and then "Single Pane" no longer immediately closes the context menu

• Code Editor: Fixed an issue where pre-2022.8 project layouts containing open code editors expanded all folded code and lost the ability to code fold until the code editor was closed and reopened manually
• Code Editor: skeleton_skin_create() is now highlighted as an in-built function (Feather or Syntax Errors - both had the issue in 2022.8 and both are fixed now)
• Crash Reporter: GMWebServer.exe is not ended properly when closing the IDE, appears to sometimes incorrectly trigger the crash reporter [see the note higher up]

• Debugger: [Mac IDE] Fullscreen IDEs opening windowed debuggers restored from a layout file are now sized correctly (no longer results in a fullscreen debugger window with black bars to fill the gaps)
• Device Manager: [Mac IDE] "Detect Browsers" now detects the full application name for Opera GX correctly, so that browser can now be used as a target device when doing HTML5 builds
• Feather: [Mac IDE] Now shows messages for all Objects correctly, rather than requiring each Object to be opened first before you were informed of its values
• Feather: ArgumentIdentity variables passed to functions now promote their types correctly from the parameter type
• Feather: array_create() return type is now correctly treated as Real, rather than always incorrectly treated as Any
• Feather: Code in the format "var a=1, b=a+1;" no longer results in an error that "a" was treated as out of scope when "b" tried to use it
• Feather: Creation of new assets or renaming existing assets now reparses the entire project correctly, fixes issues in previous releases with it missing new or old errors
• Feather: Now alerts correctly when two functions with the same name are in a script/event (as this is a compile fail and you will need to fix your code)
• Feather: Errors in timeline scripts no longer show a red cross image in the Feather Messages "Resource" column
• Feather: Can now open Timeline assets mentioned in the Feather Messages window by double-clicking them
• Feather: Unexpected GM1028 messages are no longer incorrectly raised in some circumstances
• Feather: If an enum has the same name as an asset in the Asset Browser, the tooltip for the enum is now shown correctly (rather than always showing the asset's details, like previous releases did)
• Feather: Inner and outer scope hinting no longer breaks when names are reused
• Feather: Refactoring operations no longer mangles parentheses of function signatures and new expressions in some circumstances
• Feather: Rename identifier & Go To Issue now works correctly even when the Inspector is open
• Feather: Renaming a function now correctly refactors the function definition line as well, rather than only renaming all the uses of that function elsewhere in your code
• Feather: Fixed that Rename Identifier did not work for globalvar, static vars, assets, enums or enum members
• Feather: Fixed that Rename Identifier also did not work properly inside Object event code editors
• Feather: Fixed that it was possible for GM to hang after the Rename Identifier window closes
• Feather: room_height and room_width are no longer incorrectly treated as read-only
• Feather: sequence_instance_override_object() sequence struct argument is no longer incorrectly treated as type ID.Instance
• Feather: Strict Mode now warns you when passing string parameters to functions which expect reals
• Feather: Using "self" inside a with() coming from a constructor now determines the correct type for "self"
• Feather: Auto-complete now determines scope correctly even when the inspector is open
• Feather: Variables declared in Variable Definitions no longer return an error when used outside the Create event
• Game Options: Amazon Fire options are back to being read-only again, after they were briefly editable in 2022.8
• Image Editor: [Mac IDE] Holding "CTRL" whilst using the Paint Selection Tool now adds to the selection correctly, as you would expect
• Image Editor: [Mac IDE] Image > Clipboard Paste tool now works correctly again (it was broken as of 2022.6)
• Image Editor: Sat/Val field values are no longer automatically rounded down to incorrect values when modifying the other field
• Inspector: [Mac IDE] A room's Instance Layer's "Instances" list no longer overlaps its entries
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Focus no longer changes to the wrong element when clicking on "Open Editor" on an instance in a room
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Sequence previews on asset layers are now updated correctly when the instance is changed in the Inspector to use a different sequence asset
• Marketplace Integration: [Mac IDE] Asset descriptions are no longer clipped at the end
• Preferences: [Mac IDE] General Settings > Paths text no longer overlaps on first launch when using certain DPI values
• Project Load: Made several speed-ups within CoreResources phase, so you may find your projects load more quickly now (larger projects tend to show bigger improvements)

• Project Saving: [Windows IDE] A dialog is now shown to you whenever GameMaker is unable to rename an asset because its file path on disk is too long [in previous releases this was only written to the ui.log, so you had to open that to see why the rename didn’t work]
• Redefine Keys: "String not found: RedefineKeys_...Tool" is no longer shown for multiple commands in the Preferences window [partial fix]
• Room Editor [Tile Layer]: The Tileset Editor is now opened correctly when editing Libraries from the Room Editor
• Room Editor: Creation Code windows no longer initially open to an incorrect size and requires reopening to fix
• Room Editor: GM no longer goes unstable when adding an effect layer to a new room if the entire room is panned off-screen at the time
• Search and Replace: Double-clicking on a search result now scrolls to the correct part of the code editor, rather than simply opening the code editor and focussing on line 1
• Sequence Editor: AnimCurves previews in the dopesheet are now always rendered correctly after converting from keys to a curve
• Sprite Editor: Duplicating a Spine/SWF sprite no longer causes the preview to become corrupted
• Startup: GM no longer crashes if you attempt to quickly close GM again whilst the splash screen is still showing
• Startup: Fixed that some users were unable to download runtimes due to error "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely..." in previous releases
• Syntax Checker: Now correctly handles the new-in-2022.8 optional arguments for skeleton_animation_set() and skeleton_animation_set_ext()
• Texture Groups: Tileset previews are no longer distorted
• UI: [Mac IDE] Fixed a GM crash which caused an OS “segfault” message upon clicking the close button on some Macs
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Fixed various issues where the arrow icons in various editors could overlap their own label text when using high DPI values
Runtime Modules Dialog
<ul>
• GameMaker now handles downloading just the specific modules you request from a runtime - you will see a new dialog for this the first time you start this new version
• You can select a minimal install suitable for your current OS, whichever modules you require just now, or “just give me everything” (which is what GameMaker has always done until now)
• For more information on this dialog and how to use it, please see our new FAQ all about it
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Sequence Editor: It was never really exposed in the IDE, but there was a WIP asset track available in-game - this has now been removed, as the full in-game implementation was never done, and so if you were using this “hidden” track in your games you will now need to change your code accordingly

• Localisation: Our language csv files have now been updated to conform to RFC 4180 standard (and therefore escape special characters) - whilst you may not need to make any changes in your custom setups, you should be aware of this if you’re editing ours or making your own localisation spreadsheets from scratch
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Room Manager "Collapse All" context menu command does not work unless you clicked in empty space
• Building Projects: Unable to build a project when using a Sprite with Nine Slice enabled as a Background layer, shows incorrect error message
• Building Projects: post_texture scripts are not being run when targeting platforms other than Windows
• Building Projects: [Android] Injection of IronSource's recommended ProGuard values creates an invalid ProGuard file, as an unwanted "methods" closing tag appears
• Building Projects: [GDK] Add a stage to precompile the shaders
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Attempting to re-run a project when one is still running only asks user to cancel one time
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Clicking the 'Stop' button to end a running project displays 'FAILED: Run Program Complete' in the output window
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Projects which contain the "JuJu Libraries" extension and other extensions can fail to find some of the extensions later on
• Building Projects: [macOS] Unable to build YYC from Windows for certain projects due to incorrect App ID being sent
• Code Editor (Visual): Add nodes for new get/set/use rollback player preferences functions
• Code Editor (Visual): In multicolumn layout, using arrow keys will affect all columns instead of just the selected one
• Crash Reporter: Occasionally triggered on startup when there's no record of a crash in the log and user was unaware of any issue
• Feather: Local variable definitions incorrectly flag GM2043 in some circumstances

• Game Options: [PS5] Remove redundant options which are not actually used during builds [the UI for these was removed in 2022.8, but creating a new project still wrote the default values to the .yyp, so those are removed now also]
• Go To: Feather's Preferences don't appear in search results
• Inspector: Cannot click on an already-selected item within a multi-select list to deselect it
• Inspector: [Font] [Mac IDE] Tags field cuts off the bottoms of some characters
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Copy and pasting an instance with creation code will not show the code in Inspector until you deselect and reselect the instance
• Inspector: [Sequence] Opacity and Offset controls for images should be disabled when no image has been selected
• Local Packages: Importing single objects from a package loses its parent value, even though an object with the parent's name already exists
• Local Packages: Selecting to import only a room from a package does not fully account for assets referenced in the room, can also make GM unstable if reusing an existing room's name
• Object Editor: Assets can no longer be dragged onto the Variable Definitions window pickers to set "Asset"-type values
• Preferences: "Resources" name used instead of "assets" in General Settings
• Preferences: Anti-aliasing radio buttons shift left after hovering over them
• Preferences: Feather section is not localised
• Project Export: Root-level compile scripts are not included in .yyz packages
• Project Import: If the .yyz name contains additional dots, then GM suggests an incomplete save name
• Project Save: Redundant warning when renaming newly-created and empty Timeline moments
• Room Editor: Add indicator to the Layers Panel to show when a filter/effect has been used on a layer
• Room Editor: Layers which previously inherited from other rooms keep showing the "inherited" status after the parent room is removed
• Room Editor: Paths can't be modified when "select from any layer" is enabled
• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel
Changes Since Beta IDE 227
Pinch To Zoom
<ul>
• The Workspace can now be zoomed in and out on devices with touch inputs like trackpads
• This is available for both Mac and Windows IDE
• There is a preference to disable this feature if desired
Paste image as a layer
<ul>
• The Image Editor will now allow you to paste from clipboard to a new layer
• The new layer will be above the currently selected layer and the pan tool will be selected to allow you to control the pasted content
• The old style Paste-As-Brush can be enabled in preferences
Implement a Case-insensitive Compatibility Mode for macOS/Linux
<ul>
• There has been an ongoing issue with case-sensitivity when working across different platforms and changing an Assets case when renaming
• An option has been added to allow you to disable this as it is quite performance heavy

<ul>
• Asset Browser: Wrong message when renaming a group the same as another group in the same location
• Feather: Variable Definitions used in the matching event for both parent and child object will get a Warning GM2016 message
• Install: [Runtime Modules] "Remember Selections" box is re-enabled each time the dialog appears, does not remember user choice
• Startup : Redundant copyright information on loading screen
• Workspaces: Alt button causes gadgets to lose focus

• Feather: Returning -1 from a function which returns Asset.* incorrectly raises GM1045
• Feather: sequence_instance_override_object() sequence struct argument is incorrectly treated as type ID.Instance
• Feather: Variable Definitions used in the matching event for both parent and child object will get a Warning GM2016 message
Feather: Unexpected GM2016 warnings for some "global." variables declared in scripts
Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
Feather: Declaring any variable without the 'var' keyword does not display that variable in the autocomplete thereafter
Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Install: [Runtime Modules] "Remember Selections" box is re-enabled each time the dialog appears, does not remember user choice
Recent Windows: Closing Recent Windows/Syntax Errors/Compile errors windows  from dock shows fatal error dialog; windows can no longer be re-opened
• Startup : Redundant copyright information on loading screen
UI/UX: Reopening closed Output Windows from the Windows menu always creates them undocked
• Workspaces: Alt button causes gadgets to lose focus
Beta IDE 227
Runtime Modules Dialog
<ul>
• GameMaker now handles downloading just the specific modules you request from a runtime - you will see a new dialog for this the first time you start this new version
• You can select a minimal install suitable for your current OS, whichever modules you require just now, or “just give me everything” (which is what GameMaker has always done until now)
• For more information on this dialog and how to use it, please see our new FAQ all about it
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Sequence Editor: It was never really exposed in the IDE, but there was a WIP asset track available in-game - this has now been removed, as the full in-game implementation was never done, and so if you were using this “hidden” track in your games you will now need to change your code accordingly

• Localisation: Our language csv files have now been updated to conform to RFC 4180 standard (and therefore escape special characters) - whilst you may not need to make any changes in your custom setups, you should be aware of this if you’re editing ours or making your own localisation spreadsheets from scratch
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Room Manager "Collapse All" context menu command does not work unless you clicked in empty space
• Building Projects: Unable to build a project when using a Sprite with Nine Slice enabled as a Background layer, shows incorrect error message
• Building Projects: post_texture scripts are not being run when targeting platforms other than Windows
• Building Projects: [Android] Injection of IronSource's recommended ProGuard values creates an invalid ProGuard file, as an unwanted "methods" closing tag appears
• Building Projects: [GDK] Add a stage to precompile the shaders
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Attempting to re-run a project when one is still running only asks user to cancel one time
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Clicking the 'Stop' button to end a running project displays 'FAILED: Run Program Complete' in the output window
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Projects which contain the "JuJu Libraries" extension and other extensions can fail to find some of the extensions later on
• Building Projects: [macOS] Unable to build YYC from Windows for certain projects due to incorrect App ID being sent
• Code Editor (Visual): Add nodes for new get/set/use rollback player preferences functions
• Code Editor (Visual): In multicolumn layout, using arrow keys will affect all columns instead of just the selected one
• Crash Reporter: Occasionally triggered on startup when there's no record of a crash in the log and user was unaware of any issue
• Feather: Local variable definitions incorrectly flag GM2043 in some circumstances

• Game Options: [PS5] Remove redundant options which are not actually used during builds [the UI for these was removed in 2022.8, but creating a new project still wrote the default values to the .yyp, so those are removed now also]
• Go To: Feather's Preferences don't appear in search results
• Inspector: Cannot click on an already-selected item within a multi-select list to deselect it
• Inspector: [Font] [Mac IDE] Tags field cuts off the bottoms of some characters
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Copy and pasting an instance with creation code will not show the code in Inspector until you deselect and reselect the instance
• Inspector: [Sequence] Opacity and Offset controls for images should be disabled when no image has been selected
• Local Packages: Importing single objects from a package loses its parent value, even though an object with the parent's name already exists
• Local Packages: Selecting to import only a room from a package does not fully account for assets referenced in the room, can also make GM unstable if reusing an existing room's name
• Object Editor: Assets can no longer be dragged onto the Variable Definitions window pickers to set "Asset"-type values
• Preferences: "Resources" name used instead of "assets" in General Settings
• Preferences: Anti-aliasing radio buttons shift left after hovering over them
• Preferences: Feather section is not localised
• Project Export: Root-level compile scripts are not included in .yyz packages
• Project Import: If the .yyz name contains additional dots, then GM suggests an incomplete save name
• Project Save: Redundant warning when renaming newly-created and empty Timeline moments
• Room Editor: Add indicator to the Layers Panel to show when a filter/effect has been used on a layer
• Room Editor: Layers which previously inherited from other rooms keep showing the "inherited" status after the parent room is removed
• Room Editor: Paths can't be modified when "select from any layer" is enabled
• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel
Changes Since Beta IDE 227
Pinch To Zoom
<ul>
• The Workspace can now be zoomed in and out on devices with touch inputs (like trackpads)
• This is available for both Mac and Windows IDEs
• There is a preference to disable this feature if desired
Paste image as a layer
<ul>
• The Image Editor will now allow you to paste from clipboard to a new layer
• The new layer will be above the currently selected layer and the pan tool will be selected to allow you to control the pasted content
• The old style Paste-As-Brush can be enabled in preferences
Implement a Case-insensitive Compatibility Mode for macOS/Linux
<ul>
• There has been an ongoing issue with case-sensitivity when working across different platforms and changing an Asset's case when renaming
• An option has been added to allow you to disable this, as it is quite performance heavy
Feather Additions
<ul>
• Feather Added: Validating initialiser struct variables have variable definitions for the target object (New GM2064)
• Feather Added: Quick Fix for GM1013 to create an instance variable
• Feather Added: Quick Fixes for GM2064 to create Variable Definitions for missing fields
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>
Install: Handle separated-by-OS "base" runtime package downloads in the IDE
• Licensing: Unable to use GM offline if signed-in via SSO
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Wrong message when renaming a group the same as another group in the same location
• Feather: Directives specified in scripts do not propagate to functions declared there in

• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel
Changes Since Beta IDE 230
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Feather: Improved responsiveness when displaying tooltips
• Feather: Tooltips do not update contents when hovering over same identifier on different line
• Feather: os_is_network_connected not accepting new parameter type
• Feather: Autocomplete does not show in scope variables when typing at the end of a script
• Feather: Incorrect GM2025 when passing a variable of type Asset.GMObject to a "with" statement
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Inheriting a constructor declared in an event will incorrectly raise GM1054
• Feather: Some time source functions should list Constant.TimeSource as a valid arg type
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Feather: Wrong type recognised for sampler_index in gpu_set_tex functions
Beta IDE 230
Pinch To Zoom
<ul>
• The Workspace can now be zoomed in and out on devices with touch inputs (like trackpads)
• This is available for both Mac and Windows IDEs
• There is a preference to disable this feature if desired
Paste image as a layer
<ul>
• The Image Editor will now allow you to paste from clipboard to a new layer
• The new layer will be above the currently selected layer and the pan tool will be selected to allow you to control the pasted content
• The old style Paste-As-Brush can be enabled in preferences
Implement a Case-insensitive Compatibility Mode for macOS/Linux
<ul>
• There has been an ongoing issue with case-sensitivity when working across different platforms and changing an Asset's case when renaming
• An option has been added to allow you to disable this, as it is quite performance heavy
Feather Additions
<ul>
• Feather Added: Validating initialiser struct variables have variable definitions for the target object (New GM2064)
• Feather Added: Quick Fix for GM1013 to create an instance variable
• Feather Added: Quick Fixes for GM2064 to create Variable Definitions for missing fields
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>
• Licensing: Unable to use GM offline if signed-in via SSO
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Wrong message when renaming a group the same as another group in the same location
• Feather: Directives specified in scripts do not propagate to functions declared there in
• Feather: Modifying Variable Definitions does not reparse project
• Feather: Naming Rule: camelCase: CAPSthenlower -> capsThenlower works correctly
• Feather: Naming Rule: instance variables inside of global functions do not rename despite Quick Fix
• Feather: Naming Rule: global functions do not have Quick Fixes despite suggestion
• Feather: Returning -1 from a function which returns Asset.* incorrectly raises GM1045
• Feather: sequence_instance_override_object() sequence struct argument is incorrectly treated as type ID.Instance
• Feather: Variable Definitions used in the matching event for both parent and child object will get a Warning GM2016 message
• Feather: Unexpected GM2016 warnings for some "global." variables declared in scripts
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Declaring any variable without the 'var' keyword does not display that variable in the autocomplete thereafter
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Install: [Runtime Modules] "Remember Selections" box is re-enabled each time the dialog appears, does not remember user choice
• Recent Windows: Closing Recent Windows/Syntax Errors/Compile errors windows from dock shows fatal error dialog; windows can no longer be re-opened
• Startup : Redundant copyright information on loading screen
• UI/UX: Reopening closed Output Windows from the Windows menu always creates them undocked
• Workspaces: Alt button causes gadgets to lose focus
Beta IDE 227
Runtime Modules Dialog
<ul>
• GameMaker now handles downloading just the specific modules you request from a runtime - you will see a new dialog for this the first time you start this new version
• You can select a minimal install suitable for your current OS, whichever modules you require just now, or “just give me everything” (which is what GameMaker has always done until now)
• For more information on this dialog and how to use it, please see our new FAQ all about it
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Sequence Editor: It was never really exposed in the IDE, but there was a WIP asset track available in-game - this has now been removed, as the full in-game implementation was never done, and so if you were using this “hidden” track in your games you will now need to change your code accordingly

• Localisation: Our language csv files have now been updated to conform to RFC 4180 standard (and therefore escape special characters) - whilst you may not need to make any changes in your custom setups, you should be aware of this if you’re editing ours or making your own localisation spreadsheets from scratch
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Room Manager "Collapse All" context menu command does not work unless you clicked in empty space
• Building Projects: Unable to build a project when using a Sprite with Nine Slice enabled as a Background layer, shows incorrect error message
• Building Projects: post_texture scripts are not being run when targeting platforms other than Windows
• Building Projects: [Android] Injection of IronSource's recommended ProGuard values creates an invalid ProGuard file, as an unwanted "methods" closing tag appears
• Building Projects: [GDK] Add a stage to precompile the shaders
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Attempting to re-run a project when one is still running only asks user to cancel one time
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Clicking the 'Stop' button to end a running project displays 'FAILED: Run Program Complete' in the output window
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Projects which contain the "JuJu Libraries" extension and other extensions can fail to find some of the extensions later on
• Building Projects: [macOS] Unable to build YYC from Windows for certain projects due to incorrect App ID being sent
• Code Editor (Visual): Add nodes for new get/set/use rollback player preferences functions
• Code Editor (Visual): In multicolumn layout, using arrow keys will affect all columns instead of just the selected one
• Crash Reporter: Occasionally triggered on startup when there's no record of a crash in the log and user was unaware of any issue
• Feather: Local variable definitions incorrectly flag GM2043 in some circumstances

• Game Options: [PS5] Remove redundant options which are not actually used during builds [the UI for these was removed in 2022.8, but creating a new project still wrote the default values to the .yyp, so those are removed now also]
• Go To: Feather's Preferences don't appear in search results
• Inspector: Cannot click on an already-selected item within a multi-select list to deselect it
• Inspector: [Font] [Mac IDE] Tags field cuts off the bottoms of some characters
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Copy and pasting an instance with creation code will not show the code in Inspector until you deselect and reselect the instance
• Inspector: [Sequence] Opacity and Offset controls for images should be disabled when no image has been selected
• Local Packages: Importing single objects from a package loses its parent value, even though an object with the parent's name already exists
• Local Packages: Selecting to import only a room from a package does not fully account for assets referenced in the room, can also make GM unstable if reusing an existing room's name
• Object Editor: Assets can no longer be dragged onto the Variable Definitions window pickers to set "Asset"-type values
• Preferences: "Resources" name used instead of "assets" in General Settings
• Preferences: Anti-aliasing radio buttons shift left after hovering over them
• Preferences: Feather section is not localised
• Project Export: Root-level compile scripts are not included in .yyz packages
• Project Import: If the .yyz name contains additional dots, then GM suggests an incomplete save name
• Project Save: Redundant warning when renaming newly-created and empty Timeline moments
• Room Editor: Add indicator to the Layers Panel to show when a filter/effect has been used on a layer
• Room Editor: Layers which previously inherited from other rooms keep showing the "inherited" status after the parent room is removed
• Room Editor: Paths can't be modified when "select from any layer" is enabled
• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel

Changes Since Beta IDE 233
Support for binary literals
<ul>
• Binary literals can now be declared in the form 0b, similar to hex literal 0x
• var six = 0b0110
Support for underscores in numeric literals
<ul>
• Integr, floating poitn, hex and binary literals may now take an underscore to act as a visual separator
<li>var integer = 100_000_000; <li>
<li>var float = 3_141.59; <li>
<li>var hexadec = 0xDEAD_BEEF; <li>
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Code Editor (Visual): Unable to place nodes correctly in 2022.1100 Beta 2
• Code Editor: Using bitwise macros breaks scripts
• Feather: A Function declared inside a Function will use Instance Variable Naming Rule
• Feather: Colour/Blend functions returning real according to Feather, mismatches Manual information.
• Feather: Descriptions missing for american spelling of functions
• Feather: draw_ signatures functions returning Real instead of Undefined
• Feather: enum values are cast to real values in variables
• Feather: Error messages may not be removed if error was fixed outside of IDE
• Feather: Errors in type checking due to bad data in GmlSpec.xml
• Feather: Feather marks "ds_priority_delete_min" as a pure function, which it is not
• Feather: id built-in variable does not change type according to JSDOC parameters

• Feather: mp_* functions incorrectly marked as pure
• Feather: Multiple gpu_* function signatures incorrect
• Feather: No type is reported in Feather when creating a ds_map using an accessor
• Feather: Shader functions not returning/accepting Id.Sampler
• Feather: The suggestion icon sometimes covers the total number of suggestions
• Feather: Warning when declaring a var without value - "potentially dangerous variable declaration"
• Game Options: GM unstable on clicking the GX.games account status refresh button when the SSO response is delayed by the remote server
• Startup: Handle font system where layout font and Default font cannot be loaded
• Image Editor: Brush preview only appears when moving the mouse
• Inspector: [Room] Layer context menu can become uninteractable
• Room Editor: Cannot undo alignment functions
• Room Editor: Selection remains after undo
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Some commands within the IDE don't match the Redefine Keys labels

• var integer = 100_000_000;
• var float = 3_141.59;
• var hexadec = 0xDEAD_BEEF;

• Feather: A Function declared inside a Function will use Instance Variable Naming Rule
• Feather: Colour/Blend functions returning real according to Feather, mismatches Manual information.
• Feather: Descriptions missing for american spelling of functions
• Feather: draw_ signatures functions returning Real instead of Undefined
• Feather: enum values are cast to real values in variables
• Feather: Error messages may not be removed if error was fixed outside of IDE
• Feather: Errors in type checking due to bad data in GmlSpec.xml
• Feather: Feather marks "ds_priority_delete_min" as a pure function, which it is not
• Feather: id built-in variable does not change type according to JSDOC parameters
• Feather: Missing descriptions in tooltips for US spelling of functions
• Feather: mp_* functions incorrectly marked as pure
• Feather: Multiple gpu_* function signatures incorrect
• Feather: No type is reported in Feather when creating a ds_map using an accessor
• Feather: Shader functions not returning/accepting Id.Sampler
• Feather: The suggestion icon sometimes covers the total number of suggestions
• Feather: Warning when declaring a var without value - "potentially dangerous variable declaration"
• Game Options: GM unstable on clicking the GX.games account status refresh button when the SSO response is delayed by the remote server
• Startup: Handle font system where layout font and Default font cannot be loaded
• Image Editor: Brush preview only appears when moving the mouse
• Inspector: [Room] Layer context menu can become uninteractable
• Room Editor: Cannot undo alignment functions
• Room Editor: Selection remains after undo
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Some commands within the IDE don't match the Redefine Keys labels
Beta IDE 233
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Feather: Improved responsiveness when displaying tooltips
• Feather: Tooltips do not update contents when hovering over same identifier on different line
• Feather: os_is_network_connected not accepting new parameter type
• Feather: Autocomplete does not show in scope variables when typing at the end of a script
• Feather: Incorrect GM2025 when passing a variable of type Asset.GMObject to a "with" statement
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Inheriting a constructor declared in an event will incorrectly raise GM1054
• Feather: Some time source functions should list Constant.TimeSource as a valid arg type
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Feather: Wrong type recognised for sampler_index in gpu_set_tex functions
Beta IDE 230
Pinch To Zoom
<ul>
• The Workspace can now be zoomed in and out on devices with touch inputs (like trackpads)
• This is available for both Mac and Windows IDEs
• There is a preference to disable this feature if desired
Paste image as a layer
<ul>
• The Image Editor will now allow you to paste from clipboard to a new layer
• The new layer will be above the currently selected layer and the pan tool will be selected to allow you to control the pasted content
• The old style Paste-As-Brush can be enabled in preferences
Implement a Case-insensitive Compatibility Mode for macOS/Linux
<ul>
• There has been an ongoing issue with case-sensitivity when working across different platforms and changing an Asset's case when renaming
• An option has been added to allow you to disable this, as it is quite performance heavy
Feather Additions
<ul>
• Feather Added: Validating initialiser struct variables have variable definitions for the target object (New GM2064)
• Feather Added: Quick Fix for GM1013 to create an instance variable
• Feather Added: Quick Fixes for GM2064 to create Variable Definitions for missing fields
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>
• Licensing: Unable to use GM offline if signed-in via SSO
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Wrong message when renaming a group the same as another group in the same location
• Feather: Directives specified in scripts do not propagate to functions declared there in
• Feather: Modifying Variable Definitions does not reparse project
• Feather: Naming Rule: camelCase: CAPSthenlower -> capsThenlower works correctly
• Feather: Naming Rule: instance variables inside of global functions do not rename despite Quick Fix
• Feather: Naming Rule: global functions do not have Quick Fixes despite suggestion
• Feather: Returning -1 from a function which returns Asset.* incorrectly raises GM1045
• Feather: sequence_instance_override_object() sequence struct argument is incorrectly treated as type ID.Instance
• Feather: Variable Definitions used in the matching event for both parent and child object will get a Warning GM2016 message
• Feather: Unexpected GM2016 warnings for some "global." variables declared in scripts
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Declaring any variable without the 'var' keyword does not display that variable in the autocomplete thereafter
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Install: [Runtime Modules] "Remember Selections" box is re-enabled each time the dialog appears, does not remember user choice
• Recent Windows: Closing Recent Windows/Syntax Errors/Compile errors windows from dock shows fatal error dialog; windows can no longer be re-opened
• Startup : Redundant copyright information on loading screen
• UI/UX: Reopening closed Output Windows from the Windows menu always creates them undocked
• Workspaces: Alt button causes gadgets to lose focus
Beta IDE 227
Runtime Modules Dialog
<ul>
• GameMaker now handles downloading just the specific modules you request from a runtime - you will see a new dialog for this the first time you start this new version
• You can select a minimal install suitable for your current OS, whichever modules you require just now, or “just give me everything” (which is what GameMaker has always done until now)
• For more information on this dialog and how to use it, please see our new FAQ all about it
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Sequence Editor: It was never really exposed in the IDE, but there was a WIP asset track available in-game - this has now been removed, as the full in-game implementation was never done, and so if you were using this “hidden” track in your games you will now need to change your code accordingly

• Localisation: Our language csv files have now been updated to conform to RFC 4180 standard (and therefore escape special characters) - whilst you may not need to make any changes in your custom setups, you should be aware of this if you’re editing ours or making your own localisation spreadsheets from scratch
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Room Manager "Collapse All" context menu command does not work unless you clicked in empty space
• Building Projects: Unable to build a project when using a Sprite with Nine Slice enabled as a Background layer, shows incorrect error message
• Building Projects: post_texture scripts are not being run when targeting platforms other than Windows
• Building Projects: [Android] Injection of IronSource's recommended ProGuard values creates an invalid ProGuard file, as an unwanted "methods" closing tag appears
• Building Projects: [GDK] Add a stage to precompile the shaders
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Attempting to re-run a project when one is still running only asks user to cancel one time
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Clicking the 'Stop' button to end a running project displays 'FAILED: Run Program Complete' in the output window
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Projects which contain the "JuJu Libraries" extension and other extensions can fail to find some of the extensions later on
• Building Projects: [macOS] Unable to build YYC from Windows for certain projects due to incorrect App ID being sent
• Code Editor (Visual): Add nodes for new get/set/use rollback player preferences functions
• Code Editor (Visual): In multicolumn layout, using arrow keys will affect all columns instead of just the selected one
• Crash Reporter: Occasionally triggered on startup when there's no record of a crash in the log and user was unaware of any issue
• Feather: Local variable definitions incorrectly flag GM2043 in some circumstances

• Game Options: [PS5] Remove redundant options which are not actually used during builds [the UI for these was removed in 2022.8, but creating a new project still wrote the default values to the .yyp, so those are removed now also]
• Go To: Feather's Preferences don't appear in search results
• Inspector: Cannot click on an already-selected item within a multi-select list to deselect it
• Inspector: [Font] [Mac IDE] Tags field cuts off the bottoms of some characters
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Copy and pasting an instance with creation code will not show the code in Inspector until you deselect and reselect the instance
• Inspector: [Sequence] Opacity and Offset controls for images should be disabled when no image has been selected
• Local Packages: Importing single objects from a package loses its parent value, even though an object with the parent's name already exists
• Local Packages: Selecting to import only a room from a package does not fully account for assets referenced in the room, can also make GM unstable if reusing an existing room's name
• Object Editor: Assets can no longer be dragged onto the Variable Definitions window pickers to set "Asset"-type values
• Preferences: "Resources" name used instead of "assets" in General Settings
• Preferences: Anti-aliasing radio buttons shift left after hovering over them
• Preferences: Feather section is not localised
• Project Export: Root-level compile scripts are not included in .yyz packages
• Project Import: If the .yyz name contains additional dots, then GM suggests an incomplete save name
• Project Save: Redundant warning when renaming newly-created and empty Timeline moments
• Room Editor: Add indicator to the Layers Panel to show when a filter/effect has been used on a layer
• Room Editor: Layers which previously inherited from other rooms keep showing the "inherited" status after the parent room is removed
• Room Editor: Paths can't be modified when "select from any layer" is enabled
• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel
Changes Since Beta IDE 242
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Feather: Setting event_type == ev_draw && event_number==00 returns an error
• Room Editor: "Inherit Sub Layers" and "Inherit Layer Visibility" are occasionally greyed out after enabling one of them
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Closed File Picker dialog reappears after switching back to GM from another application
Beta IDE 233
Support for binary literals
<ul>
• Binary literals can now be declared in the form 0b, similar to hex literal 0x. For example:
• var six = 0b0110;
• var thirteen = 0b0100 | 0b1001;
Support for underscores in numeric literals
<ul>
• Integer, floating point, hex, and binary literals may now take an underscore to act as a visual separator. For example:
• var integer = 100_000_000;
• var float = 3_141.59;
• var hexadec = 0xDEAD_BEEF;

• Building Projects: [HTML5] Clicking the 'Stop' button to end a running project displays 'FAILED: Run Program Complete' in the output window
• Building Projects: [HTML5] Projects which contain the "JuJu Libraries" extension and other extensions can fail to find some of the extensions later on
• Building Projects: [macOS] Unable to build YYC from Windows for certain projects due to incorrect App ID being sent
• Code Editor (Visual): Add nodes for new get/set/use rollback player preferences functions
• Code Editor (Visual): In multicolumn layout, using arrow keys will affect all columns instead of just the selected one
• Crash Reporter: Occasionally triggered on startup when there's no record of a crash in the log and user was unaware of any issue
• Feather: Local variable definitions incorrectly flag GM2043 in some circumstances

• Game Options: [PS5] Remove redundant options which are not actually used during builds [the UI for these was removed in 2022.8, but creating a new project still wrote the default values to the .yyp, so those are removed now also]
• Go To: Feather's Preferences don't appear in search results
• Inspector: Cannot click on an already-selected item within a multi-select list to deselect it
• Inspector: [Font] [Mac IDE] Tags field cuts off the bottoms of some characters
• Inspector: [Room Instance] Copy and pasting an instance with creation code will not show the code in Inspector until you deselect and reselect the instance
• Inspector: [Sequence] Opacity and Offset controls for images should be disabled when no image has been selected
• Local Packages: Importing single objects from a package loses its parent value, even though an object with the parent's name already exists
• Local Packages: Selecting to import only a room from a package does not fully account for assets referenced in the room, can also make GM unstable if reusing an existing room's name
• Object Editor: Assets can no longer be dragged onto the Variable Definitions window pickers to set "Asset"-type values
• Preferences: "Resources" name used instead of "assets" in General Settings
• Preferences: Anti-aliasing radio buttons shift left after hovering over them
• Preferences: Feather section is not localised
• Project Export: Root-level compile scripts are not included in .yyz packages
• Project Import: If the .yyz name contains additional dots, then GM suggests an incomplete save name
• Project Save: Redundant warning when renaming newly-created and empty Timeline moments
• Room Editor: Add indicator to the Layers Panel to show when a filter/effect has been used on a layer
• Room Editor: Layers which previously inherited from other rooms keep showing the "inherited" status after the parent room is removed
• Room Editor: Paths can't be modified when "select from any layer" is enabled
• Room Editor: Tile Layer panel's preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• Sprite Editor: [Spine] Unable to import images which have multiple skins using Spine's mesh-deformation feature
• Start Page: Downloading any Templates will not immediately recreate the TemplateFiles cache folder if it is missing, causes loading errors
• Start Page: Folder picker button missing hover highlight
• Start Page: Modify tour/wizard to start new users on step 2
• Startup: Failing to find a runtime feed shows 2 error dialogs and duplicates the error string on the splash screen
• Startup: GM crash when clicking other buttons too quickly after "Ignore this version"
• Startup: Logging in using SSO causes a machine.General Settings.Environment.Environment error in the ui.log
• Tile Set Editor: Auto-tiling brush-builder and animations library panels' preview icon for the tileset is no longer visible in 2022.9
• UI/UX: Mouse wheel input continues scrolling the initial dialog for too long after the cursor has been moved over another scrollable panel
Changes Since Beta IDE 244
Device Manager Support for Opera GX Mobile Devices
<ul>
• Added a new MQTT server for discovering Opera GX Mobile devices on your network, allowing you to just as easily test your GX games on your phone or tablet as you can on your desktop
• Simply scan the QR code inside Device Manager to connect the mobile device to GameMaker in seconds
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Pinch-to-zoom is incorrectly activated while click-dragging to highlighting text in any text editor
Beta IDE 244
Added More Filter Layer Types
<ul>
• Old Film, Hue, Ripples, Blocks Background, Panorama Background and Parallax Background have all now been added for you to use in your games
• Also fixed an issue with the existing Boxes filter which meant it didn't work in-game on HTML5
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Image Editor: GM crash when pasting as a brush in Nov22 Beta 3

• Licensing: Proxy server of incorrect type causes startup crash [additionally, the proxy server details field now blocks https addresses from being added and there is now more logging also for if your setup does somehow still cause issues]
• Licensing: Unable to use GM offline if signed-in via SSO
Beta IDE 243
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Feather: Setting event_type == ev_draw && event_number==00 returns an error
• Room Editor: "Inherit Sub Layers" and "Inherit Layer Visibility" are occasionally greyed out after enabling one of them
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Closed File Picker dialog reappears after switching back to GM from another application
Beta IDE 233
Support for binary literals
<ul>
• Binary literals can now be declared in the form 0b, similar to hex literal 0x. For example:
• var six = 0b0110;
• var thirteen = 0b0100 | 0b1001;
Support for underscores in numeric literals
<ul>
• Integer, floating point, hex, and binary literals may now take an underscore to act as a visual separator. For example:
• var integer = 100_000_000;
• var float = 3_141.59;
• var hexadec = 0xDEAD_BEEF;
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Code Editor (Visual): Unable to place nodes correctly in 2022.1100 Beta 2
• Code Editor: Using bitwise macros breaks scripts
• Feather: A Function declared inside a Function will use Instance Variable Naming Rule
• Feather: Colour/Blend functions returning real according to Feather, mismatches Manual information.
• Feather: Descriptions missing for american spelling of functions
• Feather: draw_ signatures functions returning Real instead of Undefined
• Feather: enum values are cast to real values in variables
• Feather: Error messages may not be removed if error was fixed outside of IDE
• Feather: Errors in type checking due to bad data in GmlSpec.xml
• Feather: Feather marks "ds_priority_delete_min" as a pure function, which it is not
• Feather: id built-in variable does not change type according to JSDOC parameters
• Feather: Missing descriptions in tooltips for US spelling of functions
• Feather: mp_* functions incorrectly marked as pure
• Feather: Multiple gpu_* function signatures incorrect
• Feather: No type is reported in Feather when creating a ds_map using an accessor
• Feather: Shader functions not returning/accepting Id.Sampler
• Feather: The suggestion icon sometimes covers the total number of suggestions
• Feather: Warning when declaring a var without value - "potentially dangerous variable declaration"
• Game Options: GM unstable on clicking the GX.games account status refresh button when the SSO response is delayed by the remote server
• Startup: Handle font system where layout font and Default font cannot be loaded
• Image Editor: Brush preview only appears when moving the mouse
• Inspector: [Room] Layer context menu can become uninteractable
• Room Editor: Cannot undo alignment functions
• Room Editor: Selection remains after undo
• UI/UX: [Mac IDE] Some commands within the IDE don't match the Redefine Keys labels
Beta IDE 233
Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Feather: Improved responsiveness when displaying tooltips
• Feather: Tooltips do not update contents when hovering over same identifier on different line
• Feather: os_is_network_connected not accepting new parameter type
• Feather: Autocomplete does not show in scope variables when typing at the end of a script
• Feather: Incorrect GM2025 when passing a variable of type Asset.GMObject to a "with" statement
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Inheriting a constructor declared in an event will incorrectly raise GM1054
• Feather: Some time source functions should list Constant.TimeSource as a valid arg type
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Feather: Wrong type recognised for sampler_index in gpu_set_tex functions
Beta IDE 230
Pinch To Zoom
<ul>
• The Workspace can now be zoomed in and out on devices with touch inputs (like trackpads)
• This is available for both Mac and Windows IDEs
• There is a preference to disable this feature if desired
Paste image as a layer
<ul>
• The Image Editor will now allow you to paste from clipboard to a new layer
• The new layer will be above the currently selected layer and the pan tool will be selected to allow you to control the pasted content
• The old style Paste-As-Brush can be enabled in preferences
Implement a Case-insensitive Compatibility Mode for macOS/Linux
<ul>
• There has been an ongoing issue with case-sensitivity when working across different platforms and changing an Asset's case when renaming
• An option has been added to allow you to disable this, as it is quite performance heavy
Feather Additions
<ul>
• Feather Added: Validating initialiser struct variables have variable definitions for the target object (New GM2064)
• Feather Added: Quick Fix for GM1013 to create an instance variable
• Feather Added: Quick Fixes for GM2064 to create Variable Definitions for missing fields
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>
• Licensing: Unable to use GM offline if signed-in via SSO
Other Bugs Fixed
<ul>
• Asset Browser: Wrong message when renaming a group the same as another group in the same location
• Feather: Directives specified in scripts do not propagate to functions declared there in
• Feather: Modifying Variable Definitions does not reparse project
• Feather: Naming Rule: camelCase: CAPSthenlower -> capsThenlower works correctly
• Feather: Naming Rule: instance variables inside of global functions do not rename despite Quick Fix
• Feather: Naming Rule: global functions do not have Quick Fixes despite suggestion
• Feather: Returning -1 from a function which returns Asset.* incorrectly raises GM1045
• Feather: sequence_instance_override_object() sequence struct argument is incorrectly treated as type ID.Instance
• Feather: Variable Definitions used in the matching event for both parent and child object will get a Warning GM2016 message
• Feather: Unexpected GM2016 warnings for some "global." variables declared in scripts
• Feather: Incorrect warnings that an alarm does not exist if calling the alarm in a function
• Feather: Declaring any variable without the 'var' keyword does not display that variable in the autocomplete thereafter
• Feather: Syntax errors for missing closing brackets are not highlighted in the code editor and the matching Feather Messages error is not clickable either
• Install: [Runtime Modules] "Remember Selections" box is re-enabled each time the dialog appears, does not remember user choice
• Recent Windows: Closing Recent Windows/Syntax Errors/Compile errors windows from dock shows fatal error dialog; windows can no longer be re-opened
• Startup : Redundant copyright information on loading screen
• UI/UX: Reopening closed Output Windows from the Windows menu always creates them undocked
• Workspaces: Alt button causes gadgets to lose focus
Beta IDE 227
Runtime Modules Dialog
<ul>
• GameMaker now handles downloading just the specific modules you request from a runtime - you will see a new dialog for this the first time you start this new version
• You can select a minimal install suitable for your current OS, whichever modules you require just now, or “just give me everything” (which is what GameMaker has always done until now)
• For more information on this dialog and how to use it, please see our new FAQ all about it
Misc Other Changes To Be Aware Of
<ul>

• Sequence Editor: It was never really exposed in the IDE, but there was a WIP asset track available in-game - this has now been removed, as the full in-game implementation was never done, and so if you were using this “hidden” track in your games you will now need to change your code accordingly

• Localisation: Our language csv files have now been updated to conform to RFC 4180 standard (and therefore escape special characters) - whilst you may not need to make any changes in your custom setups, you should be aware of this if you’re editing ours or making your own localisation spreadsheets from scratch
